content:
Here are some common default MIDI mappings for popular electronic drum kits:

1. Roland V-Drums:
	* Kick drum: MIDI note 36
	* Snare drum: MIDI note 38
	* Hi-hat: MIDI note 42 (closed), MIDI note 46 (open)
	* Tom 1: MIDI note 43
	* Tom 2: MIDI note 45
	* Tom 3: MIDI note 47
	* Crash cymbal: MIDI note 49
	* Ride cymbal: MIDI note 51
2. Alesis Nitro Mesh Kit:
	* Kick drum: MIDI note 36
	* Snare drum: MIDI note 38
	* Hi-hat: MIDI note 42 (closed), MIDI note 46 (open)
	* Tom 1: MIDI note 48
	* Tom 2: MIDI note 45
	* Tom 3: MIDI note 43
	* Crash cymbal: MIDI note 49
	* Ride cymbal: MIDI note 51
3. Yamaha DTX400
